TopicTitle: Audio Status Report mod (similar to Chatterer)

Articles.Content:
I seem to remember a Modding Monday column about forever ago featuring a mod that provided audio status reports from mission control. I'm not talking about Chatterer, which is one of my favorite mods, but something that read out things like fuel levels, monopropellent levels. altitude, and so on.

Does this ring any bells or am I just getting senile?
